00016 #ifndef SQCalorHit_h
00017 #define SQCalorHit_h 1
00018 
00019 #include "G4VHit.hh"
00020 #include "G4THitsCollection.hh"
00021 #include "G4Allocator.hh"
00022 
00023 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo....
00024 
00025 class SQCalorHit : public G4VHit
00026 {
00027   public:
00028 
00029       SQCalorHit();
00030      ~SQCalorHit();
00031       SQCalorHit(const SQCalorHit&);
00032       const SQCalorHit& operator=(const SQCalorHit&);
00033       int operator==(const SQCalorHit&) const;
00034 
00035       inline void* operator new(size_t);
00036       inline void  operator delete(void*);
00037 
00038       void Draw();
00039       void Print();
00040       
00041   public:
00042   
00043       void AddAbs(G4double de, G4double dl) {EdepAbs += de; TrackLengthAbs += dl;};
00044       void AddGap(G4double de, G4double dl) {EdepGap += de; TrackLengthGap += dl;};      
00045                  
00046       G4double GetEdepAbs()     { return EdepAbs; };
00047       G4double GetTrakAbs()     { return TrackLengthAbs; };
00048       G4double GetEdepGap()     { return EdepGap; };
00049       G4double GetTrakGap()     { return TrackLengthGap; };
00050      
00051   private:
00052   
00053       G4double EdepAbs, TrackLengthAbs;
00054       G4double EdepGap, TrackLengthGap;
00055       
00056 };
00057 
00058 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo....
00059 
00060 typedef G4THitsCollection<SQCalorHit> SQCalorHitsCollection;
00061 
00062 extern G4Allocator<SQCalorHit> SQCalorHitAllocator;
00063 
00064 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo....
00065 
00066 inline void* SQCalorHit::operator new(size_t)
00067 {
00068   void* aHit;
00069   aHit = (void*) SQCalorHitAllocator.MallocSingle();
00070   return aHit;
00071 }
00072 
00073 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo....
00074 
00075 inline void SQCalorHit::operator delete(void* aHit)
00076 {
00077   SQCalorHitAllocator.FreeSingle((SQCalorHit*) aHit);
00078 }

00080 #endif
